languages.text: "Я... тоже... ухожу..." {n}Паскаль запускает вторую, металлическую руку в рану на груди. Кисть погружается до самого запястья. С хрустом сжав что-то, техножрец рвет из себя странную, поросшую кристаллами металлическую конструкцию. Ее неестественные обводы указывают на явно ксенотехническую природу. Из-под респиратора струями течет темная кровь, тело сотрясают конвульсии, вокс заходится кашлем:{/n} "Омниссия... знает... все! Пости... Постигает!"

"So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"
languages.original_text: "Я... тоже... ухожу..." {n}Паскаль запускает вторую, металлическую руку в рану на груди. Кисть погружается до самого запястья. С хрустом сжав что-то, техножрец рвет из себя странную, поросшую кристаллами металлическую конструкцию. Ее неестественные обводы указывают на явно ксенотехническую природу. traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それで…自分は…」{n}パスカルの2本目の金属製の手が胸の傷に食い込む。手首まで入れ込むと、パキパキと音を立てて何かをつかみ、水晶で覆われた奇妙な金属製の装置を引き抜く。その不自然な輪郭は明らかに異星技術製であることを示している。ヴォクスの下から濃い血が噴き出し、体が痙攣し、咳き込んだ。{/n}「万機神は…何もかも…ご存じです！理解して…おられるのです！」
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: 「それで…自分は…」{n}パスカルの2本目の金属製の手が胸の傷に食い込む。手首まで入れ込むと、パキパキと音を立てて何かをつかみ、水晶で覆われた奇妙な金属製の装置を引き抜く。その不自然な輪郭は明らかに異星技術製であることを示している。ヴォクスの下から濃い血が噴き出し、体が痙攣し、咳き込んだ。{/n}「万機神は…何もかも…ご存じです！理解して…おられるのです！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我也……要……走了……”{n}帕斯卡将另一只金属手伸进胸口的伤口中，一直伸到了手腕处。他抓住了什么东西，发出嘎吱嘎吱的声音，随后扯出了某件古怪的金属装置，表面覆盖着一层水晶。这件装置的外型看起来非常古怪，显然是异形科技。他的身体抽搐着，呼吸器下面流出了黑色的血迹，音阵也发出阵阵剧烈的咳嗽声。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚……无所……不知！无所……不晓！”
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: “我也……要……走了……”{n}帕斯卡将另一只金属手伸进胸口的伤口中，一直伸到了手腕处。他抓住了什么东西，发出嘎吱嘎吱的声音，随后扯出了某件古怪的金属装置，表面覆盖着一层水晶。这件装置的外型看起来非常古怪，显然是异形科技。他的身体抽搐着，呼吸器下面流出了黑色的血迹，音阵也发出阵阵剧烈的咳嗽声。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚……无所……不知！无所……不晓！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Yo... también...». {n}Pasqal hunde su segunda mano metálica en la herida de su pecho. La mano entra hasta la muñeca. Agarra algo con un crujido y luego arranca un peculiar artilugio metálico cubierto de cristales. Su contorno antinatural denota claramente su origen xenotecnológico. Sangre oscura brota de debajo de su respirador, su cuerpo se convulsiona y su voco emite un ataque de tos.{/n} «¡El Omnissiah... lo sabe... todo! Lo... ¡Comprende!».
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: «Yo... también...». {n}Pasqal hunde su segunda mano metálica en la herida de su pecho. La mano entra hasta la muñeca. Agarra algo con un crujido y luego arranca un peculiar artilugio metálico cubierto de cristales. Su contorno antinatural denota claramente su origen xenotecnológico. Sangre oscura brota de debajo de su respirador, su cuerpo se convulsiona y su voco emite un ataque de tos.{/n} «¡El Omnissiah... lo sabe... todo! Lo... ¡Comprende!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "So ... bin ... ich ..." {n}Pasqal taucht seine zweite, metallene Hand in die Wunde auf seiner Brust. Sie passt bis zum Handgelenk hinein. Er packt mit einem knirschenden Geräusch etwas und reißt dann eine merkwürdige, in Kristall gehüllte metallene Apparatur heraus. Der unnatürliche Umriss lässt keinen Zweifel, dass es sich um Xenotech handelt. Dunkles Blut schießt aus seinem Respirator, sein ganzer Körper zuckt und sein Vox bricht in einen Hustenanfall aus.{/n} "Der Omnissiah ... weiß ... alles! Begr... Begreift!"
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: "So ... bin ... ich ..." {n}Pasqal taucht seine zweite, metallene Hand in die Wunde auf seiner Brust. Sie passt bis zum Handgelenk hinein. Er packt mit einem knirschenden Geräusch etwas und reißt dann eine merkwürdige, in Kristall gehüllte metallene Apparatur heraus. Der unnatürliche Umriss lässt keinen Zweifel, dass es sich um Xenotech handelt. Dunkles Blut schießt aus seinem Respirator, sein ganzer Körper zuckt und sein Vox bricht in einen Hustenanfall aus.{/n} "Der Omnissiah ... weiß ... alles! Begr... Begreift!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Moi... aussi... » {n}Pasqal plonge sa seconde main dans sa plaie béante et se met à farfouiller. Enfin, il saisit quelque chose et, d'un geste sec, arrache une étrange pièce métallique couverte de cristaux. Sa forme anormale ne peut signifier qu'une chose : il s'agit là d'un mécanisme d'origine xénotechnologique. Le vox pris d'une soudaine quinte de toux, Pasqal crache du sang noir par son respirateur tout en essayant, en vain, de contrôler son corps secoué de convulsions.{/n} « L'Omnimessie... sait tout ! Comprend... tout ! »
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: « Moi... aussi... » {n}Pasqal plonge sa seconde main dans sa plaie béante et se met à farfouiller. Enfin, il saisit quelque chose et, d'un geste sec, arrache une étrange pièce métallique couverte de cristaux. Sa forme anormale ne peut signifier qu'une chose : il s'agit là d'un mécanisme d'origine xénotech. Le vox pris d'une soudaine quinte de toux, Pasqal crache du sang noir par son respirateur tout en essayant, en vain, de contrôler son corps secoué de convulsions.{/n} « L'Omnimessie... sait tout ! Comprend... tout ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ben... De... Öyle..." {n}Pasqal, diğer metal elini de göğsündeki yaraya sokuyor. Eli, bileğine kadar içeri giriyor. Bir şeyi sıkıca tutmasıyla birlikte bir çıtırtı duyuluyor. Ardından Pasqal; acayip görünüşlü ve kristallerle kaplı, metal bir aleti söküp çıkarıyor. Aletin gayritabii görünüşü, zeno teknolojisi olduğunu gösteriyor. Pasqal'ın solunum maskesinden kara kanlar akıyor. Vücudunun spazm geçirmesiyle birlikte voksu, öksürük nöbetine tutuluyor.{/n} "Hermesih... Her şeyi... Bilir! Her şeyin... Farkındadır!"
languages.original_text: "So... am... I..." {n}Pasqal sinks his second, metallic hand into the wound in his chest. The hand goes in up to its wrist. He grips something with a crunching sound and then rips out a peculiar, crystal-covered metal contraption. Its unnatural outline clearly denotes its xenotech origin. Dark blood gushes from under his respirator, his body convulses, and his vox spouts out a coughing fit.{/n} "The Omnissiah... knows... all! Comp... Comprehends!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben... De... Öyle..." {n}Pasqal, diğer metal elini de göğsündeki yaraya sokuyor. Eli bileğine kadar içeri giriyor. Bir şeyi sıkıca tutmasıyla birlikte bir çıtırtı duyuluyor. Ardından da Pasqal acayip görünüşlü ve kristallerle kaplı metal bir aleti söküp çıkarıyor. Aletin gayri tabii görünüşü, zeno teknolojisi olduğunu açıkça ortaya koyuyor. Pasqal'ın solunum maskesinden kara kanlar akıyor. Vücudunun spazm geçirmesiyle birlikte voksundan bir öksürük nöbeti duyuluyor.{/n} "Hermesih... Her şeyi... Bilir! Her şeyin... Farkındadır!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
